file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 33-23-05-04 - RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove and install the return-to-seat sign lamp and the return-to-seat sign assembly. B. The return-to-seat sign is installed in the lavatory and, when on, it tells the passengers to return to their seats. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN LAMP - REMOV- ALL 33-23-05-000-801-A AL RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN LAMP - INSTAL- ALL 33-23-05-400-801-A LATION RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN ASSEMBLY - ALL 33-23-05-000-802-A REMOVAL RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN ASSEMBLY - IN- ALL 33-23-05-400-802-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 33-23-05 Page 1 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-05-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN LAMP - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the return-to-seat sign lamp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the overhead panel, make sure the FSTN BELTS switch is in the OFF position and attach a DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag to it. (2) Remove the Amenity Dispenser (AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Remove the screws (2) and washers (3). (2) Carefully remove the lamp (5) from the PCB Mounting Bracket (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-05 Page 2 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Return-to-Seat Sign - Removal/Installation Figure 401 B DET. A A ZONE 272 1. SPLICE 2. SCREW (2) 3. WASHER (2) 4. PCB MOUNTING BRACKET 5. LAMP DET. B 145AMM330177.MCE EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 33-23-05 Page 3 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-05-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN LAMP - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the return-to-seat sign lamp. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-01-400-801-A/400 - PASSENGER WARNING SIGNS - OPERATIONAL AMM TASK 33-23-00-700-801-A/500 TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Carefully install the lamp (5) in the PCB Mounting Bracket (4). (2) Put the PCB Mounting Bracket (4) in its installation position. (3) Install the screws (2) and washers (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag from the FSTN BELTS switch. (2) Do the Passenger Warning Signs test ( AMM TASK 33-23-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-23-05 Page 4 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install the Amenity Dispenser (AMM TASK 25-40-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 33-23-05 Page 5 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-05-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 4. RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN ASSEMBLY - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to remove the return-to-seat sign assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) On the overhead panel, make sure the FSTN BELTS switch is in the OFF position and attach a DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag to it. (2) Remove the Amenity Dispenser (AMM TASK 25-40-01-000-801-A/400). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-003-A (1) Remove the screws (2) and washers (3). (2) Disconnect the splice (1). (3) Remove the PCB Mounting Bracket (4). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 33-23-05 Page 6 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 33-23-05-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 5. RETURN-TO-SEAT SIGN ASSEMBLY - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedures to install the return-to-seat sign assembly. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 25-40-01-400-801-A/400 - PASSENGER WARNING SIGNS - OPERATIONAL AMM TASK 33-23-00-700-801-A/500 TEST C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 272 Lavatory D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Lavatory I. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-003-A (1) Connect the splice (1). (2) Put the PCB Mounting Bracket (4) in its installation position. (3) Install the screws (2) and washers (3). J. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Remove the DO-NOT-TURN-ON tag from the FSTN BELTS switch. (2) Do the Passenger Warning Signs test ( AMM TASK 33-23-00-700-801-A/500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-23-05 Page 7 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Install the Amenity Dispenser (AMM TASK 25-40-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-802-A/400 33-23-05 Page 8 of 8 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
